channel.title: Daily Feed (Updated 9 AM BD)
channel.description: Daily Feed (Updated 9 AM BD) generated by script

item.title: Foreign interference and Indonesia's buzzer networks
item.description: New X data reveals the networks amplifying false narratives, yet attribution remains frustratingly elusive.

item.title: Australians risk becoming “strangers in our own region”
item.description: A parliamentary inquiry confronts decades of decline in language learning and cultural knowledge of the region.

item.title: Is G20 becoming what it sought to replace?
item.description: Rather than a sharp and agile forum, the G20 has blown out more to matter less.

item.title: Switzerland votes decisively against inheritance tax
item.description: But its billionaires threaten to flee if there is another attempt to fleece them

item.title: How China views its economic relations with Indonesia
item.description: Economic dependence, not alliance, suits Beijing’s interests.

item.title: Is America’s jobs market nearing a cliff?
item.description: Bosses, investors and policymakers are worried, but there are reasons for hope

item.title: Trafficking humans is the drug-gangs’ grimmest business
item.description: Mass migration and sex tourism are causing a new wave of exploitation across Latin America
